title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2420.1 - Extension of the wage freeze
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 2420.1 - Extension of the wage freeze

State Regulations

The suspension of salary or wage increases and the suspension
of other payments pursuant to section 10 of the act are continued in effect
until the end of the emergency period. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
2420.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
